segments.text: Can you tell me about some good deals on produce ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The mangoes are on sale today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They have yellowish red skin . It's a fruit with one big seed .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe if you were a parrot . I wouldn't recommend it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How much does a mango cost ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Normally , they're $ 2 each . Today , they're only $ 1 each .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe I won't like the taste .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's hard to describe . They're sweet , but also sort of acidity .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do I tell the difference between a ripe one and an unripe one ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They're similar to an avocado . When the outside feels soft , they're ripe .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Where do most of them come from ?
segments.speaker: S1
